introEmbed.title: üì¶ **Plugin Development Request**
questions: What type of plugin do you need? (Describe main features and functionality)
Which Minecraft version and platform? (Spigot, Paper, Fabric, etc.)
Do you have any specific requirements or integrations needed?
What's your preferred timeline for completion?
What's your estimated budget range for this project?

introEmbed.title: üèóÔ∏è **Minecraft Build Commission**
questions: What type of build do you need? (Spawn, Hub, City, Castle, etc.)
What style or theme are you looking for? (Medieval, Modern, Fantasy, etc.)
What size should the build be? (Approximate dimensions or scale)
Do you have any reference images or examples of what you want?
When do you need this build completed by?

introEmbed.title: ü§ù **Partnership Opportunity**
questions: Tell us about your project, server, or organization
What type of partnership are you proposing?
What value can you bring to our community?
What are you looking for from us in return?
What's your proposed timeline and next steps?

introEmbed.title: üí∏ **Refund Request**
questions: What is your order/payment reference number or transaction ID?
What is the reason for requesting this refund?
When did you make the original purchase?
Please provide any additional details or evidence to support your request

introEmbed.title: üÜò **General Support & Questions**
questions: What specific issue or question do you have?
What steps have you already tried to resolve this?
When did this issue first occur?
Do you have any error messages, screenshots, or logs to share?
